document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">scanty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">die </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">merest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Greek </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">living, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Sweet, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">costlier </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">offer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">even </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Dying, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">trifle, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">past, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">living, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">include </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">multifold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Respite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">dead </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Too scanty 'twas to die for you
